## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal mine at position (52.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting
- The agent attempted to craft a `burner-mining-drill` but lacked the required `iron-plate`. Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft.
- The agent attempted to craft a `burner-mining-drill` which requires `stone-furnace`, but the agent did not have enough `stone` to craft the `stone-furnace`. Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft.

### Errors when inserting items
- The agent attempted to insert `iron-ore` into a furnace but had no `iron-ore` in its inventory. Ensure the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert it.
- The agent attempted to insert `coal` into a drill, but had no `coal` in its inventory. Ensure the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert it.
- The agent attempted to insert `coal` into an inserter, but had no `coal` in its inventory. Ensure the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert it.

### Errors when placing entities
- The agent attempted to place a `burner-mining-drill` at a position where an entity already exists. Ensure the target position is free before attempting to place an entity.
- The agent attempted to place a `wooden-chest` next to a drill, but a `stone-furnace` was already present at the intended location. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.
- The agent attempted to place a `stone-furnace` next to a drill, but a `wooden-chest` was already present at the intended location. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.
- The agent attempted to place a `wooden-chest` next to an inserter, but a `wooden-chest` was already present at the intended location. Consider increasing the spacing, changing the direction, or changing the reference position.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables
- `drill`: Type unknown.
- `furnace`: Type unknown.
- `inserter`: Type unknown.
- `chest`: Type unknown.
